	 <div class="column1">
	 
	       
	    <div id="ctl00_cpContent_mainContentBlock">
	<p class="introduction">Dim the lights, open the curtain, and a hush of excitement settles over the audience.</p>
<p>For more than two decades, <a href="http://onstageatiup.com/">OnStage… Arts and Entertainment</a> has brought to the IUP campus, community, and surrounding areas spectacular entertainment. IUP consistently presents the very best established and emerging national and international artists and much more in its 1,452-seat facility, Fisher Performing Arts Center.</p>
<p><span class="sub_head">Buy tickets at</span> <a href="http://www.iuptickets.com/"><span class="sub_head">IUP Tickets.com</span></a><span class="sub_head">, in person at the HUB Ticket Office, or by calling 724-357-1313.</span></p>
</div>
        
	    
	</div>
    <div class="column2">
    
		
	    
        <div>
	<dl><dt><a title="“OnStage...” Arts and Entertainment" href="http://onstageatiup.com/">“OnStage...” Arts and Entertainment</a> </dt><dd>Bringing approximately twelve nationally touring performers and shows to IUP each year.</dd></dl>
</div>
		
    	<div class="blogRecentPosts"><div class="RecentNews"><h2><a href="/news.aspx?blogid=7837">Recent News</a></h2><ul><li><a href="/newsItem.aspx?id=108447&amp;blogid=7837" class="blogrecentlink">Tickets on Sale for “Spring Awakening,” Award-Winning Broadway Musical</a></li><li><a href="/newsItem.aspx?id=107640&amp;blogid=7837" class="blogrecentlink">Tony Award-Winning “Spring Awakening” Coming to IUP</a></li><li><a href="/newsItem.aspx?id=107101&amp;blogid=7837" class="blogrecentlink">Great Seats Still Available for Starship, March 19</a></li><li><a href="/newsItem.aspx?id=106899&amp;blogid=7837" class="blogrecentlink">Little Anthony and the Imperials Coming to IUP</a></li><li><a href="/newsItem.aspx?id=105170&amp;blogid=7837" class="blogrecentlink">Starship Coming to IUP on March 19</a></li></ul></div></div>
